title: Building Polyglot Developer Experiences in 2024
author: Mauricio Salatino
description: How to use Dapr, Knative Serving, and Dagger to build custom (and polyglot) developer experiences optimized for specialized workflows.
cntitle: 2024 年构建多语言开发者体验
cndescription: 如何使用 Dapr、Knative Serving 和 Dagger 构建针对特定工作流优化的自定义（和多语言）开发者体验。
